Class ApplicationStoredProgram

Namespace
Finalassignment
Assembly
Finalassignment.dll

Represents a stored program that includes methods, variables, and execution logic. Inherits from the StoredProgram base class.

public class ApplicationStoredProgram : StoredProgram, IList, ICollection, IEnumerable, ICloneable, IStoredProgram
